Search bs4Dash variables

Source: R/search-vars.R
search_vars_bs4dash.Rd

Search bs4Dash variables

search_vars_bs4dash(pattern = NULL, source = c("adminlte", "bootstrap"))

Arguments

pattern

A pattern to filter the results.
source

Search variables in AdminLTE or Bootstrap or both.

Value

a data.frame with three variables:

  • source: AdminLTE or Bootstrap variable.

  • variable: name of the variable.

  • value: default value used.

Examples

# Retrieve all variables
all_vars <- search_vars_bs4dash()
head(all_vars, 20)
#>                  variable                          value   source
#> 1                    blue                        #0073b7 adminlte
#> 2               lightblue                        #3c8dbc adminlte
#> 3                    navy                        #001f3f adminlte
#> 4                    teal                        #39cccc adminlte
#> 5                   olive                        #3d9970 adminlte
#> 6                    lime                        #01ff70 adminlte
#> 7                  orange                        #ff851b adminlte
#> 8                 fuchsia                        #f012be adminlte
#> 9                  purple                        #605ca8 adminlte
#> 10                 maroon                        #d81b60 adminlte
#> 11                  black                           #111 adminlte
#> 12           gray-x-light                        #d2d6de adminlte
#> 13                 colors                    map-merge(( adminlte
#> 14         font-size-root                           1rem adminlte
#> 15          sidebar-width                          250px adminlte
#> 16      sidebar-padding-x                         0.5rem adminlte
#> 17      sidebar-padding-y                              0 adminlte
#> 18 boxed-layout-max-width                         1250px adminlte
#> 19 screen-header-collapse map-get($grid-breakpoints, md) adminlte
#> 20                main-bg                        #f4f6f9 adminlte

# Search for a pattern
head(search_vars_bs4dash("navbar"))
#>                      variable                                       value
#> 327 navbar-nav-link-padding-x                                        1rem
#> 328    navbar-brand-font-size                               $font-size-lg
#> 330       navbar-brand-height $navbar-brand-font-size * $line-height-base
#> 332  navbar-toggler-padding-y                                      .25rem
#> 333  navbar-toggler-padding-x                                      .75rem
#> 334  navbar-toggler-font-size                               $font-size-lg
#>        source
#> 327 bootstrap
#> 328 bootstrap
#> 330 bootstrap
#> 332 bootstrap
#> 333 bootstrap
#> 334 bootstrap
